entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mackenzie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:59 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mackenzie Airport 8:25 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -10.4°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
